title: Man sues parrot for defamation
text: A man claimed that his neighbor’s parrot repeated defamatory statements, damaging his reputation.

title: Woman challenges traffic light timing
text: The plaintiff argued that the yellow light was too short, causing her to receive an unfair ticket.

title: Dog inherits millionaire’s estate
text: A wealthy man left his entire fortune to his pet dog, sparking a legal battle among distant relatives.

title: Student sues university over bad WiFi
text: A student claimed poor campus WiFi disrupted online classes and demanded tuition reimbursement.

title: Man sues himself and wins
text: In a bizarre turn, a man filed a lawsuit against himself for damages and technically won, but owed himself money.
